build.description: Commit the existing containers as new docker images, and create a new docker-compose file referencing them.

template.name: template
template.description: Path to a docker-compose template file, relative to the project root. WARNING: this must match the original one the project was constructed with.

destination.name: destination
destination.description: Path to the output docker-compose file, relative to the project root.

init.description: Generates a docker-compose.yml file from a template

template.name: template
template.description: path to a docker-compose template file, relative to the project root

args.name: container
args.description: Name of the container to target. Use `docker ps` to see available containers.

pull.description: Push images referenced in a compose file from a remote repository.

template.name: template
template.description: Path to a docker-compose template file, relative to the project root. WARNING: this must match the original one the project was constructed with.

push.description: Push images referenced in a compose file to a remote repository.

template.name: template
template.description: Path to a docker-compose template file, relative to the project root. WARNING: this must match the original one the project was constructed with.

shell.description: Open a shell session on the given container.

args.name: container
args.description: Name of the container to target. Use `docker ps` to see available containers.

start.description: Spin up containers using docker-compose and update /etc/hosts file.

stop.description: Stops running containers for a project.
